tha-ap377:0.3_0: Hearing the seven vows, the senior monks,
tha-ap377:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap377:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap377:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap377:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Khāṇumataka.
tha-ap377:7.1_0: The seventh round of the senior monks is finished.
